name: Html5openmon
body:
HTML5Openmon
============

HTML5Openmon is an opensource HTML5Pok√®mon-Remake.

About the Game:
---------------
+ enchant.js GameEngine
+ cookie save file and web backup
+ cookie import/export
+ websocket multiplayer
+ lanserver in nodejs

- - -

German Blog:
 http://html5openmon.blogspot.com
